title: James Gunn just confirmed a massive 24-person cast for his 'Suicide Squad' movie and he hints that not everyone's going to survive

Margot Robbie will be back as Harley Quinn in "The Suicide Squad." Warner Bros.

James Gunn just confirmed a massive 24-person cast for his 'Suicide Squad' movie and he hints that not everyone's going to survive

Close icon Two crossed lines that form an 'X'. It indicates a way to close an interaction, or dismiss a notification.
description: The director shared a photo with names on social media confirming John Cena, Michael Rooker, Margot Robbie, his brother, and more will be in the DC movie.
